name_en: I Won't Let You Leave Yet
description_jp: 次に発動するSP特技で獲得するボルテージが自身のテクニックの29.5%増加
description_en: The Voltage gained from the next SP Skill increases by 29.5% of own Technique

effect.display: Gain 29.5% of Technique as extra Voltage on next SP skill
effect.formatting: Gain {effect} of Technique as extra Voltage on next SP skill
